Password¶

class Password.Password[source]¶
decrypt(encrypted_password, key)[source]¶

Decrypts an encrypted password given a key

Parameters:
  • encrypted_password – password to be decrypted
  • key – the key needed to decrypt the password
Returns:

String – the decrypted password.
encrypt(password, key)[source]¶

Encrypts the given password using the given key

Parameters:
  • password – the password to be encrypted
  • key – the key used to encrypt the password
Retuns:

String – the encrypted password
generate()[source]¶

Generates a password

Dependencies: special, digits, uppercase and lowercase (either True or False)

generate_hash(password)[source]¶

Generates a hash by a given user password

Parameters:password – the password to be hashed
Returns:String – the hashed password
generate_key()[source]¶

Generates a new key

Returns:an array representing the key
import_key(key)[source]¶

Imports a key

Returns:the decoded key

Allows/forbids the generation of digits

Parameters:to_generate – boolean
set_length(length)[source]¶

Sets the length of an automatically generated password

Param:length - the length of the password to be generated
